content.description: The direct start to Superman. Sit start below the large overhanging wall at a low shelf. Work up the arete and into the seam of Superman.
content.location: Right beneath the crux of Superman is where it starts.

content.description: Start on a juggy arete and traverse it to the right. After you keep going right you will come to a small seam. Figure out how to get through the seam (crux) by heelhooking the arete, bumping, crossing, and maybe controlling a swing depending on your beta. There are many ways to do this section. After you get through the seam there are jugs up and right and then jugs up and left after that. Finish with an easy topout. This is a really awesome problem that is worth going to do if you are close by with nothing else to do.
content.protection: Have as many pads as possible. The landing is really treacherous with a whole bunch of rocks everywhere. The landing is really really bad. Would not reccommend to do solo.
content.location: It is on the Superman Boulder. If you park directly above the parking lot wall it is the large boulder with a large slab on the side facing the parking lot. Walk to the front of the boulder so you are facing the the parking lot. Superman climbs the left arete.

content.description: Sit start at an attractive, juggy ledge with a hand-heel match just to the right of Shorty. Make a tough reach to another great jug then scrape up to the top.
Climbs the right arete of the Superman Boulder via one difficult move. Pull onto the arete and work your way up. The hard move is the second one. After that there are some really good holds.
content.protection: Pad and Spotter. The landing is really bad.
content.location: The right arete of the Superman Boulder. To the right of Superman past the large overhanging face.

content.description: This problem climbs a short face to the left of Superman. A large horzontal crack splits the face. Start on the left side of the crack with bad underlclings and bad feet. Make one hard move to a good hold above and top it out.
content.location: To the right of superman. Starts in the large horizontal crack to the left and climbs right up the face through one move.

content.description: When you pull up to the parking area at the nubble this is the large collection of boulders directly in front of the parking lot. Just walk towards the water. There are lots of problems here. Some will take some creativity to find. I posted some of the good moderates well worth doing.
